name: Terminal (Sarrixx)
description:
This game was made by a team of two people for the September 48 Secret Jam, and came in second place (of 9 total entries). This jam had two themes to adhere too, the first being 'the terminal' and the second theme being '2 minute countdown'.

You have been 'employed' as the sole luggage handler of a small airport. Tired, lethargic, and missing the world outside your tiny work room - you must sort the luggage into the correct departure terminals before the planes leave and you may just earn your next meal, and potentially one day - your freedom.

Controls

Movement - WASD & Mouse

Interact - E or Left Mouse Button

Quit - Escape

Credits

Joshua Ferguson - Programming, Game Design, Audio

Matt Cabrera - Art Style/Design, Modelling, Texturing, Lighting
